text: Law of the Wild may refer to: *The Law of the Wilds, a 1915 American silent short drama film directed by Thomas Ricketts *The Law of the Wild, a 1934 American Mascot movie serial directed by B. Reeves Eason and Armand Schaefer *Law of the Wolf also known as Law of the Wild, a 1939 American film directed by Bernard B. Ray
title: Law of the Wild
